segment.documentation: BGM, A segment by means of which the sender must uniquely identify the COLREQ message using its type and number and when necessary its function.
DTM, A segment specifying the date and/or time the message is created.
FCA, A segment specifying the allocation of charges.
DOC, A segment specifying the documents attached to the documentary collection. It may also specify, where necessary, the number of copies and/or originals of document.
INP, A segment specifying special collection instructions (e.g. protest or non protest instructions) in coded form.
FTX, A segment with free text information used for the description of goods or services and when additional information is needed but cannot be accommodated within other segments.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments identifying the financial institutions and account numbers involved in the documentary collection, their functions and notification references.

segment.documentation: FII, A segment identifying the financial institution(s) associated with the documentary collection, in coded or uncoded form, their functions and account numbers involved.
RFF, A segment specifying reference numbers of parties specified in the leading FII segment.
CTA, A segment identifying a person or a department for the party specified in the leading FII segment to whom communication should be directed.
COM, A segment identifying communication type(s) and number(s) of person(s) or department(s) specified in the associated CTA segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments identifying the name and address of each non-financial party involved in the transaction, their functions and notification references.

segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying names and addresses of the parties associated with the documentary collection, in coded or uncoded form, and their functions.
RFF, A segment specifying reference numbers of parties specified in the leading NAD segment.
CTA, A segment identifying a person or a department for the party specified in the leading NAD segment to whom communication should be directed.
COM, A segment identifying communication type(s) and number(s) of person(s) or department(s) specified in the associated CTA segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments specifying how the maturity date for payment and/or acceptance of the collection order is to be determined and, if applicable, a specific maturity date.

segment.documentation: PAT, A segment specifying how the maturity date for payment and/or acceptance of the collection order is to be determined in coded form.
DTM, A segment specifying, when necessary, a specific maturity date.
FTX, A segment specifying how the maturity date for payment and/or acceptance of the collection order is to be determined in free text form.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments specifying the amount and currency of the documentary collection and, if applicable, any additional amounts covered under the documentary collection. It may also specify details, if applicable, about additional amount(s) to be collected and/or deducted (e.g. interest).

segment.documentation: MOA, A segment specifying the amount and currency of the documentary collection and, if applicable, any additional amounts to be collected an/or deducted under the documentary collection. Specification of the documentary collection amount is mandatory for the COLREQ message.
FTX, A segment specifying details, if applicable, about additional amount(s) to be collected and/or deducted (e.g. interest).

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments specifying the mode of transport, date of shipment and from where and to where the shipment has been made.

segment.documentation: TDT, A segment specifying the mode of transport for the goods item(s).
DTM, A segment specifying the date of shipment.
LOC, A segment specifying from where and to where shipment has been made.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments providing information for subsequent use by regulatory authorities requiring statistical and other types of data. It includes identification of the authority for which the information is intended followed by the information itself.

segment.documentation: GIS, A segment identifying what processing should be completed by regulatory authorities.
MOA, A segment giving the amount and the currency of each transaction to be reported.
LOC, A segment giving the different origins and/or destinations (places) of goods and/or investment and/or services.
NAD, A segment identifying the central and/or regulatory authority in coded or uncoded form.
RCS, A segment giving the nature (e.g. goods, transport services) and direction of each transaction to be recorded in coded form.
FTX, A segment specifying the supplementary information for the central and/or regulatory authority in uncoded form.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments specifying details of any authentication (validation) procedures applied to the COLREQ message.

segment.documentation: AUT, A segment specifying details of any authentication (validation) procedures applied to the COLREQ message.
DTM, A segment identifying the validation date and/or time.
